email_thread.author: alice@example.com
email_thread.message: Team, please ensure all tasks are completed by the end of this month. Alice will check in with each department for updates.

email_thread.author: bob@example.com
email_thread.message: Thanks for the reminder, Alice. Bob will finalize the budget review by the 15th.

email_thread.author: carol@example.com
email_thread.message: Carol is facing some issues with the data and will need more time. Carol will send an updated report by June 25.

email_thread.author: alice@example.com
email_thread.message: No problem, Carol. Alice will check in on the status next week.

email_thread.author: bob@example.com
email_thread.message: The revised report will be ready by July 5. Bob will ensure it's submitted on time.

email_thread.author: alice@example.com
email_thread.message: Reminder: Team, we have a strategy meeting on July 15. Alice will prepare the agenda.

email_thread.author: carol@example.com
email_thread.message: Carol has had a schedule conflict but will provide input on the strategy meeting agenda ahead of time.

email_thread.author: alice@example.com
email_thread.message: Team, the end-of-quarter report needs to be submitted by next week. Alice will consolidate the team inputs.

email_thread.author: bob@example.com
email_thread.message: Bob has completed the analysis for the report. Bob will send the draft to Alice by tomorrow.

email_thread.author: alice@example.com
email_thread.message: Team, we need to finalize the quarterly review. Alice will distribute the review material.

email_thread.author: carol@example.com
email_thread.message: Carol will not be able to attend the meeting but will share a written update on the team's progress.

email_thread.author: alice@example.com
email_thread.message: Reminder: The quarterly review is scheduled for next Friday. Alice will ensure all preparations are complete.

email_thread.author: bob@example.com
email_thread.message: Bob has completed the final draft of the presentation and will send it over for review.

email_thread.author: alice@example.com
email_thread.message: Team, it's time to plan for the next quarter. Alice will initiate the planning session next week.

email_thread.author: bob@example.com
email_thread.message: Bob has suggested a new approach for next quarter's goals. Bob will present it in the planning session.

email_thread.author: alice@example.com
email_thread.message: Team, the first round of the next quarterâ€™s goals will be finalized next week. Alice will draft the agenda for the meeting.

email_thread.author: carol@example.com
email_thread.message: Carol has reviewed the goals for the next quarter and will provide feedback during the meeting.

email_thread.author: alice@example.com
email_thread.message: Team, the final draft for the upcoming quarter is ready. Alice will review it with everyone before final submission.

email_thread.author: bob@example.com
email_thread.message: Bob has completed the updates for the meeting and will share the final version with the team by tomorrow.
